_sText:
This is my second serious map. I had the help of PieRate, a friend who helped with the bomb sites mainly.

This map uses the prodigy textures and some train models. There might be some others thrown in there. There is 2 bomb sites, which you can see on the overview screenshot.


This is the first beta so all complaints and bugs should be posted here please :)



PS: If you use this map on your server at all please post here so I can play it :)
PSS: The pakrating was painfull so if you have an error with the banner or the overview please post, but there shouldn't be.
